description_html: The Namaste Collection was created to be soft in touch and color, inspired by the quiet beauty of nature our and our connection to it through the practice of yoga and to encourage a sense of calm and balance through interior designs. This collection is offered in four qualities of leather, Prana; a natural grain cowhide that has very light and subtle matte finish which highlights the smooth grain, Shanti; a soft and subtle pearlescent finish that highlights the smooth, natural grain of this selected hide, Karma; an embossed pattern, Mini Cobble, highlighted by a soft and subtle pearlescent effect, and Raja; an embossed imprint of a fluid and continuous wave pattern, Geowave, highlighted by a soft and subtle pearlescent effect. All products are available in 8 relaxing and calming colors that each have exceptional durability and cutting yield. Available in custom colors and patterns that all meet industry standards, with lead times of only four weeks.
